column2: "Ah, you must be an ARKS too. There have been a lot more of us on Naberius lately."
"Before that incident with the Darkers, it was rare to run into anybody around here."
"But the fact that there are so many ARKS here shows how dangerous it's become. Ideally, nobody would need to be here at all."
"We'd be out of a job if that happened, but that's a price worth paying for peace."
"Hm? There was someone saying the same thing as me?"
